event_text: m_c was grabbed and dropped by an eagle, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} somehow survived.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred when an eagle grabbed {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after an eagle grabbed {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

event_text: m_c thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} walking on a snowdrift till it gave way and {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell down the mountain, breaking {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} leg.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell through a snowdrift and down the mountain.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after falling down the mountain.

event_text: m_c fell from a cliff and somehow survived, though not without breaking {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} leg.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell off a cliff.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after falling off a cliff.

event_text: m_c was climbing a tree when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} fell. Luckily, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} only bruised by the incident.
m_c was pushing through some dense shrubs and felt the branches tear painfully at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.
m_c survived a vicious eagle attack - with the claw marks to prove it!

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred by an eagle.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after fighting an eagle.

event_text: m_c was climbing a tree and got a splinter from one of the branches.
m_c was moving some branches out of the way when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got a splinter.
m_c was out wandering the territory for a bit too long and came back with frostbite.
m_c fell into a river, and inhaled a lot of water before managing to get out. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} been hacking and sputtering ever since.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from water-inhalation after falling in the river.

event_text: m_c's tail was badly injured by falling rocks.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred by falling rocks.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after rocks fell on {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
